text: Co-Editable Message: new key feature, world premiere. Now you can make your message editable by other selected Members. Just click right on your message and select « Make Editable ». Soon available on Mobile.
Annotations: select any markup in a PDF and identify easily to whom it belongs.
Channel: System message shows old and new Channel names when renamed.
Channel: Enhanced experience to add & remove quickly several Members.
Drive: Easy sorting of files and folders.
User Interface: Lots of small improvements across the app.
